Complete collection of backgrounds for D&D 5e 2024 A customizable triptych containing all available backgrounds from D&D 5e 2024. Each card presents the skills, equipment, and special traits of each background. Contents: All backgrounds from D&D 5e 2024 Informative cards with complete details Starting equipment and skills 5e 2024 Compatible Customization options: Selection of backgrounds by theme Grouping by adventure type Triptych format for easy consultation Individual cards available Bring your character's past to life with rich and detailed backgrounds!
